TEMPERATURE_INDEPENDENT:Temperature Profile (K):Temperature from ECMWF operational used in the retrieval (in K):ALTITUDE
INTEGRATION.TIME:Approximate integration time of the ozone profiles (in s).::DATETIME:REAL:s:0.0
